Question: K-BioCELF Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
K-BioCELF Inc.

CES 2024

- Develops liquid biopsy platform for early cancer detection and prevention
- Offers CELB ACE + ONT system for liquid biopsy platform technology
- Utilizes circulating tumor cell (CTC) separation device technology for selecting living cancer cells
- Provides personalized platform based on automated cell culture and sample separation and automation system
- Offers other products and services including CELP, CELF, CELH, and customer automation system
- Focuses on diagnostic equipment, advanced biopharmaceuticals, autoimmune disease treatment, anticancer treatment, and bio-production automation equipment
